songs.lyrics:
[Chorus] x2
Sabailai paisa kai khacho
Sabai chhan jhuto yaha paisa nai sacho
Mukh ma tala ni yehi paisa le lako
Tyo tala ko ni yaha paisa nai saacho

[Verse 1}
J paisa le hunchha tyo kei le ni hunna
Jati j gareni kehi pani hunna
Yo paisa le baneko samajik janjal
Yaha paisa nahuda khyal garne ni hunna
Pariwar lai ni yaha paisa nai sukha
Sathibhai le ni herchhan paisa kai mukha
Sabailai cha yaha paisa le dhuka
Kamaunu parchha chhaina paisako rukha
Asankhya paisa chaina man khusi
Paisa le man khokro pardachha jhusi
Kuiyyera aatma ma lagdacha dhusi
Tyesaile paisa malai chaiyena muji
Khusi hos manvari chaiyena dhanpani
Sathivai dampati, nisasu sampati
Kasailai navani, kehi pani nagari
Paisa kai pachadi kudhdai chas ta pani

[Chorus] x2
Sabailai paisa kai khacho
Sabai chhan jhuto yaha paisa nai sacho
Mukh ma tala ni yehi paisa le lako
Tyo tala ko ni yaha paisa nai saacho

[Verse 2]
Paisale nai baneko sarkar, dhaleko cha sarkar
Thadeko chha darbar, ladeko chha gharbhar
Bageko chha harbar
Kathmandu ko baato ma afthyaro chha Asaar
Sabai paisa kai kheladi
Nagarik in sidhi hunna paisa le nepali
Paisa kai lagi hunchha baisa ko khelbaji
Dan rah bheti vandai yaha daiba ni khela jit
Paisa kai lagi magchhan din vari bhig pani
Paisa navaye painna yah kinnalai bhig pani
Bujhaudo ho manis ko bhitra ko chit pani
Chaina kohi pani bhinna ni, everybody nich pani

[Chorus] x2
Sabailai paisa kai khacho
Sabai chhan jhuto yaha paisa nai sacho
Mukh ma tala ni yehi paisa le lako
Tyo tala ko ni yaha paisa nai saacho
songs.title: Paisa
